website_summaries.verdict: Weighing in at just over 6 pounds, this is a lightweight but powerful hedge trimmer.
pros: This budget-conscious hedge trimmer sports a full 22-inch blade for handling all your trimming work without the added weight of a battery
It's designed to reduce vibrations, so it is easier on your hands when you’re working
cons: As with any corded garden tool you'll need an extension cord – so maximum reach will be 100 feet

customer_reviews.title: Old one lasted 30 years -
customer_reviews.text: For the money B &D , makes very good tools. Our old one ,we used every other month on 2 huge hedges ,for 30 years. It still ran ,but the pivot sheered-off ,that moves the blade .This one seems to be just as well made, this one has much more power. I'll let you know in 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Byron  Alton

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying clippers. I searched the reviews and thought this one would work. It had and it makes quick work of the hedges. Does well with heavier branches you just have to go slow and let it get them in the teeth. I was stuck between the longer clippers and getting a pair of the shorter ones. Go long! Makes cutting deeper and taller hedges easy. And the weight is minimal. As quickly and easily these things trim you don’t have to work your arms to much.
customer_reviews.author: ks2dice

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for a great price on a great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I was tied of paying a landscaper, to do work on my property that I wasn’t happy with ,plus i also wanted to spend less time outside doing the same work. I’m glad that I read the reviews. I purchased this Black and Decker trimmer to make my yard work easier and it has ! Really I am amazed at how much i accomplished in a day and a half of trimming and cleaning up. It use to take me at least 3 days to complete this same task. This Black and Deck is a gem, it’s light in weight and powerful. It cut through our mature hedges and flower tree branches with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Hedge Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: It cuts well and I like the 3/4" cutting capacity and the 22" length. It is a lot noisier that my old 16" B&D trimmer and I miss the auto stop and the lock switch in on position features. This one coasts for a while after releasing the trigger switch. My old trimmer still works and I attribute this to after every use spraying the cutting bar with WD-40 and then running the trimmer a second or two before storing. Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This replaces another of the same model which lost its connection between blade and motor drive after a long period in service. So I have no complaint about it’s durability. It works just as effectively with sharp blades that do cut up branches to the advertised limit. While it is maneuverable, it’s weight is an adverse factor depending on one’s strength. I can still manage to use it at arms reach even though I am now in my mid eighties. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.C.Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Bad motor
customer_reviews.text: I had a hedge hog for over 10 years before it died and I bought this 6 months ago and it already died. The motor started giving me trouble the first day I used it. I am very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Cybershard

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and lightweight trimmer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace our older black and decker 2.6 amp smaller hedge trimmer we bought back in 1988. It still worked but didn’t seem powerful enough for the huge hedges we now have. This trimmer is a definite step up! I am impressed with how it easily cuts through thicker branches. Trimming took so much less time. I wish I had upgraded a long time ago. If you are looking at trimmers with less than 4 amps I strongly suggest you upgrade the first time. This was a super deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MooMooMizzu

customer_reviews.title: What a Difference a Little Power Makes
customer_reviews.text: Have a B&D battery powered hedge trimmer. I used to think it was the bees knees...until I bought this electric hedge trimmer. Plug it in and it cuts through hedges like a knife through butter. It's a little heavy so if you are a 60 year old female, eat your Wheaties before starting any huge trimming project. Even if it never worked again, the job it did on one of my huge hedges was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinestate

customer_reviews.title: Helps if you have strong hands
customer_reviews.text: The tool is as advertised and cuts hedges as expected. Due to the safety element of squeezing the trigger while holding the latch down with thumb it requires darn good forearm strength and stamina to cut multiple hedges and areas. If I didn’t have the strength going into using this trimmer, I certainly will after using it several times. My previous trimmer was very old and probably not safe given these features but I certainly could grip a glass of water after cleaning up!
customer_reviews.author: GreenThumb12

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a few months... Don’t buy a corded heads trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of corded hedge trimmer’s. I cut through two different extension cords are using this tool. It also quit working after about two months, now it just does a high-pitched whine and you have to hit it on the bottom for it to cut again, which is only temporary until it decides to quit working. I threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: BJD from ATL

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time I used them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these in Aug. In anticipation of Bush trimming this month. Used very lightly a and both pair broke. Sounds like the blade came disconnected from the motor. Too late to return so I guess I will take them apart and look. These are the 22in long ones. Have not had the same problem with the 17in. Ones.
customer_reviews.author: C Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Get this one, it's very good.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, light weight easy to use nice blades no problems luv it. Didn't want battery operated as I need to be able to use it for longer periods of time, worked very well cutting thru thick hedges no problem used 30 weight sae oil on it and all is good, nothing to do but clean it after use .
customer_reviews.author: How products work

customer_reviews.title: The ability to move the device easily.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be heavier than my last trimmer. I have very high hedges and use a 10 foot ladder and stand at the top. I need to be able to balance the movement on the ladder along with the hedge trimmer. It seems to be a little heavier than my last one. I have had four so far. I use the hedge trimmer a great deal so I need to be in control of the device all the time. I am only 5feet 2inches... So you can see the hedge trimming is a big event monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane gegus

customer_reviews.title: New hedge cutter
customer_reviews.text: Old one died after a decade and got a new one thats even lighter. Worked well then started using this year, bought it new August 2019 and now June 2020- it is smelling- light smoke comes out after a minute- why would it die so soon? the One I had prior lasted for 9 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Black & Decker products
customer_reviews.text: I have had B&D 20V blower and trimmer for a couple years now and they work great. I bought this CORDED trimmer because it has better cutting capacity and cordless versions, from what I read, tend to run out of power rather quickly and I have lot's of hedges to trim. Very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Why Me.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Cut through hedges really well. Handled woody pieces quickly. I hope the blade stays sharp for a long time. (By the way, one of the customer questions and answers implies that the blades do not stay sharp and B&D does not offer blade replacements. I plan on keep the blades oiled which will minimize that.)
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works well but noisier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver and not too heavy for this older woman to use. The blades are a good length and I'm glad I did not purchase the shorter model. I was surprised at how noisy this unit is for an electric tool and would still recommend using hearing protection when using.
customer_reviews.author: grandmapeg

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as a straight razor
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible tool for hedges. Makes yard work a snap, but WATCH OUT. It is VERY SHARP and can cut at the touch even when it is unplugged. It cuts effortlessly in any direction. Make sure it is the direction you want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: More better power to weight ratio and endurance over battery power
customer_reviews.text: Stonger power cutting delivery. Additionally far more practical than battery versions, which while motor is good battery storage capacity weakens over years.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and The Price is Great too!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to trim our overgrown bushes out in front of our house. I settled on this trimmer ,and I am so glad I did. As soon as it arrived my husband took it out of the box and tried it out on the bushes. Wow! It worked great and cut the bushes perfectly. They look so good and are square on the top now like I wanted. I would so buy this again. Love it! So does my husband because this makes his job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to operate hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Toro hedge trimmer with this product from Black & Decker. Almost 1/2 the weight and also has a much better plug holder that prevents the tool from disconnection, a constant problem with the Toro. Highly recomment this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: allano

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hedge trimmer. Glides through boxwoods and other shrubs with ease. Cuts through much larger branches than most trimmers and even has a tiny saw on the edge of the blade for bigger branches. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly of finishing pieces. Works excellent. TOOL ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Best price around. Works excellent. This is the tool only. Use tour own grounded extension cord. Easy to assemble safety guard/handle attachment.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thicker rose bush growth.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts a little bigger rose bush branches than the average shrub trimmer. I use it to cut knockout roses back in the springs. Once wiggle slice through the branches just above any knuckles worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Guglielmo Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cutting vines
customer_reviews.text: I have some unruly vines in my yard that range in thickness from about 1/8th to 3/8th inches, and this cuts them smoothly without problem. I tried this on a bush with stiffer branches and it held up well. I wouldn't use it on anything greater than half an inch. Overall good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this trimmer now for several weeks and feel it's the best trimmer I've had. I tried the battery powered ones from Black & Decker, but like this one much more.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, light weight, cuts down working hours
customer_reviews.text: It is what I was looking for maintaining hedges around my garden. I have a magnificient privet hedge (24 feet long, 8 feet height) that last summer needed to be trimmed every 2 weeks. 4 hours work each time with my big pruning scissor, now it takes a 1/3 of the time. Great maneuverability, and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great, Lightweight, Easy-to-Maneuver Product
customer_reviews.text: This hedge trimmer is exceptionally lightweight and easy to maneuver. The long reach was helpful in getting all the way to the edges. There were just a few screws to screw in, but it took less than 5 minutes. The electric connection is so much better than gas. No mixing of gas and oil, no fumes, and less weight. They cut easily through the hedges and didn’t get stuck once. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but far from great.
customer_reviews.text: The good: handsome appearance, light weight, long and nice price. The bad: cord management system and it just doesn’t seem to be operating as fast as it “should”.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Cuts very well
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than my old one and can handles thicker branches very well. Poweful and cuts great. Cut my trimming time by at least an hour.
customer_reviews.author: SC Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker quality that is affordable
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blades and the 4 amp motor never bogs down. My old B&D at 2.8 amps was slow on the thicker branches. This model cuts through a ficus hedge easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Farquar

customer_reviews.title: Cuts with ease
customer_reviews.text: This hedge trimmer has remarkable power for a cheap hedge trimmer I now understand the the ratings for this trimmer first hand big value for the bucks
customer_reviews.author: Dabeane1959

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I already had a Black and Decker 18" but it would not cut through bigger branches. This one cuts thick branches very easily. Highly reccoment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace an old one. It arrived quickly. It is easy to use but a bit heavier than I expected. I am pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to maneuver!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Have had other brands that wear out quickly, or jam and stop, but this trimmer goes through my holly bushes with ease!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Rodenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new trimmer....read the reviews and got this one. So far, so good. Sharp and cuts beautifully. I'm an old fart so it's not too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: jan tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hedge trimmer so I can't really compare to other trimmers. At least now I have a big lopsided bush instead of a monster shaggy one!
customer_reviews.author: Dwarf Eight

customer_reviews.title: Where there is smoke, there is fire
customer_reviews.text: Started smoking on second day of use. Turns out the housing around the gears its all plastic, and it started to smoke and melt. Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller Black & Decker that broke when I clipped my chain link fence. (don't do that haha) This one is larger, and more powerful. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool! I keep my bushes in the front yard in perfect shape with this tool! It is my favorite yard tool!
customer_reviews.author: Looneysmurf

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of B & D 22" Trimmers - the other wore out after 10+ years. That should be reason enough to snag one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Hering

customer_reviews.title: Best trimmer I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best trimmer I've ever had, light weight for women 22 inches to be able to do anything and easy to maneuver..Don't hesitate to but this
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it handles and zips right through my hedges
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My old trimmer was jamming up all the time, and I thought this was normal until I got my new B&D, the wife and I are very happy with this trimmers ability to cut through light to moderate brush with ease, great but
customer_reviews.author: Maypuppet

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it and says it works great. That's all that matters since he does all the trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer replaced my old garage sale B&D. It was smaller and not as powerful. This new one is powerful and just as easy to use as the smaller old model.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McInturff

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lite
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, cuts good and a lot lighter than to old one I had. Very good method of keeping the extension cord fastened to the trimmer preventing it from disconnecting during use.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: These are nice hedge trimmers. They honestly exceeded my expectations. It holds my extension cord nicely and securely while trimming all sizes of plants. They seem very sturdy so I am hoping they last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Great Hedge Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I used this the day after I received it. It is very sharp and works really good. I am happy with the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Corded hedger
customer_reviews.text: As expected, this corded hedger had much more power and cutting ability than the 20v battery model I initially ordered. It only took me about 10 minutes before I realized I needed to upgrade to either gas or corded electric power. The corded model finished my hedge within a couple days - the battery model could never have done the job at all. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once but it worked great and it give you some serious reach too.
customer_reviews.author: Techguy1724

customer_reviews.title: Good Light Duty Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable easy to use if not very sturdy hedge trimmer. Good for light duty.
customer_reviews.author: J. A MONTALBANO

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 40 year old craftsman. Much lighter, way quieter!! I use it for my lawn business, and it does what I expect.
customer_reviews.author: Garage welder

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, cuts fast
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my old craftsman unit. Significantly less weight with what seems to be more power (although rated the same). Having fresh sharp blades certainly helps the job go Faster/smoother
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nero

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, timely delivery. Great power and nice length. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sparks flew, Tripped circuit breaker and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed recently as life got busy with current situation. Used it once and the sparks flew and tripped my circuit breaker and never worked again. The return window closed and cannot return now :-( If the manufacturer is reading this, I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: phan

customer_reviews.title: It is a great clipper
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous model that I really loved. This one is much better more power and more balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Benson

customer_reviews.title: long reach and good choping power!
customer_reviews.text: I can cut the entire top of the hedges due to the long reach. It also is powerful enough to cut thick branches without ever getting jambed. My only concern is what might occur if it gets a hold of one of my fingers. It will be much harder to play my guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a smaller space!
customer_reviews.text: I had not used a power trimmer before and was amazed at how easy it was to assemble and use. It is easier to use with protective gloves and has plenty of power as long as the branches aren't too thick. It does not come with a cord, which needs to be a certain diameter to accommodate the cord guard.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great, arrived on time and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for trimming
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised at how agile and sharp this trimmer is. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: John Graves

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed for our long hedge
customer_reviews.text: My husband's arms are not aching from holding and using this hedge trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bohlinger

customer_reviews.title: Great timmer for difficult to reach branches!
customer_reviews.text: Great hedge trimmer for those hard to reach bushes and/or trees. Additionally, more powerful than anticipated for an electric hedge trimmer as it cut through fairly large size branches with ease. Highly recommend at the current cost even intended for limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Callahan Woolett

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Only used this trimmer once but it seems like it will be
customer_reviews.author: Sir Sixty

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Item returned. I found the same one that I thought was lost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: We now have thicker plants to cut back in the fall. This one made quick work with the wider teeth, longer blade and more power then my old hand me down from grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Still have the first that is close to 20 years old. This one is lighter, sharper and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Kuhns

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Power like a gas but is electric Made short work of overgrown 30’ x 6’ tall wall of shrubs
customer_reviews.author: 2000 tundra

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work more than a minute or so and even after contacting the seller, no response. I strongly encourage to do good research before buying.
customer_reviews.author: ohboy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment in time saved!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heavier duty trimmer! Did the mature hedges in 1/2 the time.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Intermediary

customer_reviews.title: RIP to the bushes in front of my house!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Opened up the whole front yard with this bad boy!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheConners

customer_reviews.title: cuts heavy shrubs easily
customer_reviews.text: nice and light to handle. but tough on bushes and hedges.
customer_reviews.author: robert Meier

customer_reviews.title: Blade cover won’t fit or stay put
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get the hand cover to fix properly. It keeps falling off and the screw doesn’t hold it leaving a little safety hazard. Should correct this problem. Other than that worked fine
customer_reviews.author: AGangwar

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, and the extra reach makes the job waaaaaay easier
customer_reviews.author: ColinC

customer_reviews.title: Switch failed after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Switch failed after 2 months, or about 3 uses. I ended up replacing it myself as the return/warrenty process was a joke. Avoid and buy a better brand
customer_reviews.author: unhpian

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: Use on a oak bush hedge and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old worn out trimmer by the same maker. It is exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: csimpson48360

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: much more than I expected light and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low power
customer_reviews.text: Not enough amps. Not as much power as Craftman from Sears. Lightweight
customer_reviews.author: kathleen mc anally

customer_reviews.title: I like em.
customer_reviews.text: I am a very part time weekend warrior and these worked like I expected. Trimmed the hedges. Pretty reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: brad nordseth

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer is easy to operate and will cut 1/2 inch branches. I have used it several times with no issues. The lack of a button to keep the trigger depressed may be inconvenient to some users.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cuts thru all the heavy stuff without hesitation.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and powerful!! Does a great job in trimming my bushes - any size branches have been NO problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Moller

customer_reviews.title: works great and is such a time saver.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, and my backyard looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Definitely does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing 1 LONG hedge by hand for 7 years. This tool beats it all!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Darlyne

customer_reviews.title: Ease of assembly and use.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly beats a manual set of clippers for this aging lady.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have other Black + Decker products. Great trimmer & price for the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: S.V.

customer_reviews.title: excellant cutting
customer_reviews.text: Cuts very sharp no more torn shrub limbs. Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Condensa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband he he loves it, very light weight and easy to use. Highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: Silvia F.

customer_reviews.title: BnD hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: just received this hedge trimmer and it works great, light weight and easy to use. Should have gotten one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Haley

customer_reviews.title: Lite-weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to bend over so far with the 22" blade. Easy handling.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Yard Work?
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer works just fine. It's the cleanup that is the hard part.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne O.

customer_reviews.title: How well it cuts
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! Was done with a very large holly Bush in no time
customer_reviews.author: Alysse K.

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Hedge and bush trimming, much requiring the tool to be used with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, lightweight and cut right through half inch branches
customer_reviews.author: michael m

customer_reviews.title: worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: used it today. quiet than gas trimmers and worked effectively. satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Herry

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Screw Is Broken
customer_reviews.text: I received the product but one of the screw is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Quangdeptrai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for trimming bushes. Handles make holding it in different positions easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works easy and cuts great! I really love this trimmer
customer_reviews.author: Dee Blanpied

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my hedges. Easy to put together if you read the directions and easy to use. It is not for think heavy branches.
customer_reviews.author: Tjgirl713

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER BEHT350 22 Inch Electric Hedge Trimmer
product_meta.description: Style:22" TrimmerThe BLACK+DECKER BEHT350 22" Electric Hedge Trimmer features a 22 in. dual-action hardened steel black for reduced vibration while trimming (Compared to BLACK+DECKER single-action blade models). It has a 4.0 amp motor for trimming branches up to 3/4 in. This trimmer offers a lightweight, compact design that is easy to use with less fatigue - with a full wrap-around front handle which provides greater comfort and control while cutting. Cord retention prevents accidental unplugging while you work. Backed by BLACK+DECKER'S 2 year limited warranty. Includes: (1) BEHT350 22" Hedge Trimmer.
feature_bullets: 22 inch Dual action hardened Steel Black for reduced vibration while trimming
4.0 amp motor for trimming branches up to 3/4 inch
Lightweight, compact design is easy to use with less fatigue
Full wrap around front handle for greater comfort and control while cutting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars435 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
